headline: Stocks to buy today: HDFC Bank to Suzlon Energy ? Anshul Jain picks these four shares in rising Indian stock market
intro: Stocks to buy today: Amid the rally in the Indian stock market today, Anshul Jain recommends buying Suzlon Energy, HDFC Bank, HDFC Asset Management Company and HDFC Life Insurance Company.
imagecaption: Stocks to buy today: Among stock picks, three stocks to buy today are HDFC group stocks.

headline: Dividend stocks HDFC Bank, HDFC Life, HDFC AMC to declare dividend next week. Do you own any?
intro: Dividend stocks: HDFC Bank, HDFC Life Insurance, and HDFC Asset Management Company are set to announce their Q4 FY25 results and dividends next week. HDFC Bank's results will be revealed on April 19, while HDFC Life and HDFC AMC will announce on April 17.
imagecaption: Dividend stocks HDFC Bank, HDFC Life, HDFC AMC to declare dividend next week. Do you own any?

headline: Mcap of eight of top-10 valued firms tumbles  ?2 lakh crore; Reliance biggest laggard
intro: Sensex and Nifty fell for the eighth consecutive day, losing 2,644.6 points and 810 points, respectively. Major firms from the top 10, such as Reliance and TCS saw significant drops in m-cap, while Bharti Airtel and ICICI Bank gained.
imagecaption: Sensex and Nifty fell for the eighth consecutive day, losing 2,644.6 points and 810 points, respectively.

headline: HDFC Life share price surges over 9.5% on strong Q3 performance. Should you buy?
intro: HDFC Life's shares surged 9.60% following Q3FY25 results, wherein the insurance company posted a 15% net profit increase. Analysts are positive, with CLSA and Jefferies maintaining buy ratings. HSBC expects margin improvements as credit protection sales increase and low-margin product growth slows.
imagecaption: HDFC Life Insurance stock gains over 9.5% on strong Q3 performance.

headline: Q3 results: RIL, Infosys, HCL Tech, Wipro, Tech Mahindra among companies to declare earnings next week; check full list
intro: Infosys, Wipro, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra, Kotak Mahindra Bank, L&T Technology Services, LTI Mindtree, HDFC Asset Management Company (AMC), and HDFC Life Insurance are set to release their quarterly financial results in the upcoming week.
imagecaption: Q3 results: RIL, Infosys, HCL Tech, Wipro, Tech Mahindra among companies to declare earnings next week.
